title: The Reluctant Bride: One Woman's Journey (Kicking and Screaming) Down the Aisle
description: A hilarious account of the year Lucy Mangan got married (having always said she wouldn't). But now she has to find a caterer who doesn't charge a fortune for a cupcake, a dressmaker who doesn't make her cry and a way to bring Great Auntie Betty down from Dundee for the sixpence she is willing to spend - isn't it meant to be HER special day?
author: mangan-lucy
